product_name: BOB Revolution / Strides Duallie Sun Shield
long_description: Protect your kids-the BOB Duallie Sun Shield reduces heat inside stroller, as well as glare and harmful UVA/UVB rays from sun light. Also offers protection from wind and flying insects. Allows children to see out and parents to see in. Durable nylon frame and nylon mesh window. Elastic attachment is simple and easy. Fits BOB double Revolution and Strides strollers. Please note: Single Sun Shield is pictured, but be assured you are ordering the duallie size.
short_description: Protect your kids-the BOB Duallie Sun Shield reduces heat inside stroller, as well as glare and harmful UVA/UVB rays from sun light.
